summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QuickSlot booking app MVP. Backend APIs fully functional (100% pass rate), frontend UI working with minor session management issues.

integration_issues.issue: User sessions expire quickly requiring re-authentication for protected routes

passed_tests: Backend API health checks (root, health endpoints)
Public booking endpoints (business info, services, create booking)
Landing page UI (hero, features, pricing, testimonials)
Signup flow and redirect to dashboard
Public booking page error handling (invalid business ID)
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider implementing longer JWT token expiry or refresh token mechanism to improve user experience with session persistence
